alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kimble and south central Menard Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 1773, or 8 miles southwest of Menard, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 1773 and Us- 83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
